ccc
***


Description
===========

Use the Compute Cloud@Customer CLI to manage Compute Cloud@Customer
infrastructures and upgrade schedules. For more information see
Compute Cloud@Customer documentation.


Available Commands
==================

* infrastructure

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* upgrade-schedule

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update
